amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce various accounts by $500 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce various accounts by $500 million and to apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 274 (Roll no. 549).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 274 (Roll no. 549).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Garrett.
